mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_itf_vehicle(hphm, tvis_json_id, occur_time, camera_id, category, il_type, tvis_json_tbl, cllxzfl, vehs_idx) VALUES(#{dcHpDTO.hphm}, #{tvisJsonId}, #{dcHpDTO.dcTime}, #{dcHpDTO.dcAddr}, #{dcHpDTO.category}, #{dcHpDTO.ilType}, #{tvisJsonTbl}, #{cllxzfl}, #{dcHpDTO.vehsIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1, 10) as createTime, COUNT(1) as `count` FROM t_violation tv WHERE tv.create_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime} > tv.create_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1, 10) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(tv.create_time, 1, 10)

SELECT SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10) as createTime, COUNT(1) as `count` FROM t_itf_vehicle tiv WHERE tiv.occur_time > #{startTime} AND #{endTime}> tiv.occur_time GROUP BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10) ORDER BY SUBSTRING(tiv.occur_time, 1, 10)
